sentence.text: Prenatal features were polyhydramnios, nuchal edema and short extremities.

At birth, he presented with short stature (âˆ’4 SD), cleft palate with glossoptosis and micro-retrognathia, narrow thorax, pectus carinatum, bilateral clinodactyly of fingers, and fifth toes, knee hyperlaxity without dislocation, secundum atrial septal defect and patent ductus arteriosus, broad nasal root and low-set ears.

Radiological features included metacarpo-phalangeal and metatarso-phalangeal extra bones, bilateral hypoplasia of the proximal phalanx of the index fingers, abnormally shaped phalanges and carpal synostosis between the capitate and hamate bones without advanced bone age.
